title: Biotic potential line on pop vs time graph

content.description: Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the figure below. A, B, C, and D represent population growth curves, E represents the carrying capacity.
content.question: Represents the biotic potential of the species

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
